title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: ADDIE Model-Based Optimization Strategies for Training Program Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Awareness of the ADDIE Model’s Fundamental Structure
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: They can explain the core processes of the ADDIE model’s five stages (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) and apply them to real educational cases.
They can design an iterative improvement process for the ADDIE model to respond to technological advancements and rapid educational development demands.
They can implement formative assessment tools (quizzes, feedback surveys, etc.) using an LMS in a limited technological environment (smartphones) to measure educational effectiveness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
